mapper.insert: insert into work_quality_statistics(id, nickName, effectiveSessionCoun, resolved, unsolved, goodReview, mediumReview, badReview, noReview) values(#{workQualityStatistics.id}, #{workQualityStatistics.nickName}, #{workQualityStatistics.effectiveSessionCoun}, #{workQualityStatistics.resolved}, #{workQualityStatistics.unsolved}, #{workQualityStatistics.goodReview}, #{workQualityStatistics.mediumReview}, #{workQualityStatistics.badReview}, #{workQualityStatistics.noReview})
